title: You Might Be A Redneck If ... This Is The Biggest Book You’ve Ever Read
description: You Might Be A Redneck if… Containing more than 2,000 entries with more than 200 illustrations, You Might Be A Redneck if…This Is The Biggest Book You've Ever Read will be a must-own book for die-hard fans of Jeff Foxworthy. Creatively packaged and attractively priced, this book also features more than 1,500 entries that have never been published in book form.
author: David Boyd
